name: KV Front-end Post Submission
author: Kvvaradha

sections.description:
It helps to submit your posts from your theme front end. Also you can have few admin options to configure your settings.

Still its a minimum pack, i will update full control to navigate these things. Read Kvcodes.com
sections.installation:
• Download
  • Extract and copy the folder to Plugins Directory (/wp-content/plugins) of your blog.. (do not rename!) or you can install it from within your wordpress admin panel to do this click on add new under the plugin tab then search for kv-front post you will see the plugin by varadharaj v click the Install Now link this will automatically install the plugin
  • Activate Plugin
  • To know how to Make settings go to [www.kvcodes.com]
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  • Download
  • Extract and copy the folder to Plugins Directory (/wp-content/plugins) of your blog.. (do not rename!) or you can install it from within your wordpress admin panel to do this click on add new under the plugin tab then search for kv-front post you will see the plugin by varadharaj v click the Install Now link this will automatically install the plugin
  • Activate Plugin
  • To know how to Make settings go to [www.kvcodes.com]

short_description: Front post Submission is a simple plug-in to submit WordPress posts from the front end.
description:
It helps to submit your posts from your theme front end. Also you can have few admin options to configure your settings.

Still its a minimum pack, i will update full control to navigate these things. Read Kvcodes.com

upgrade_notice: Version 1.1 Form options flushed and styles added independent form design.
